turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to track my order, but the tracking link isn't working. I'm getting pretty frustrated, to be honest.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can help you with that. Could you please provide your order number so I can check the status for you? Also, what is the tracking number you are referring to?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, my order number is #12345. The tracking number is ABC123XYZ. I clicked the link in the email, but it just says the page can't be found. What's going on? Is my order even shipped?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thanks for providing that information. Let me look that up for you. Okay, it appears your order has been shipped. The tracking information indicates it was picked up by the carrier on Tuesday. However, the tracking link on your email appears to be incorrect. I will submit this to our technical team. In the meantime, if you follow these steps, you can track your order manually. You should also get a new tracking email in the next few hours. I'm so sorry for this inconvenience. But you can still track your order manually. The problem is related to a recent update to the shipping system, and we are working to address it. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Actually, yes. This is helpful, but how does your returns policy handle items damaged during shipping? I saw something similar happened to a friend of mine, and they had a terrible time. And I'm also concerned about the product quality. I hope this is not going to be a similar situation.
